changes.short: Defined PORT constant for server configuration
changes.long: Introduced a constant 'PORT' set to 3000, used for configuring the server's listening port. This simplifies the management of server settings and provides a clear reference point for the server's operating port.
Added a new route '/datetime' that returns the current date and time in ISO format. This route enhances the API by providing a utility endpoint for time checks.

changes.short: Initialized server listening on defined PORT
changes.long: Configured the Express app to listen on the defined 'PORT'. This addition also includes a console log statement that outputs a message when the server is successfully running, aiding in development and debugging.
